Privacy Policy

Just scroll down and read all the details in our privacy policy.

Privacy Policy

Effective Date: March 01, 2017

1. Introduction

Welcome to Bespoke Tone. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

2. Information We Collect

  • Google Analytics: We use Google Analytics to track website usage and improve user experience. Google may collect anonymized data, such as your IP address, browser type, and time spent on pages.
  • Cookies: This site uses cookies to enhance functionality and analyze traffic. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.

3. How We Use Your Information

We use the data collected to:

  • Improve website performance and user experience.
  • Analyze traffic and visitor behavior.

4. Third-Party Services

We may use third-party services like Google Analytics. Their privacy policies govern how they collect and process data. You can opt-out of Google Analytics tracking by visiting this page.

5. Your Rights and Choices

Here's what you can do to protect yourself from being tracked on this site and on other sites:

  • Disable cookies in your browser settings.
  • Use browser extensions to block tracking scripts.

6. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

7. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at info@jennifervanelk.com.

Bespoke Tone is a DBA of Jennifer Van Elk Photography LLC.
